name: Talk2School
0:
”Alexa, open northwood elementary”
”Alexa, start northwood elementary”
”Alexa, launch northwood elementary”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: northwood elementary
Developer Terms of Use
des: Talk2School allows parents to engage with their children's school at their convenience using Alexa. Talk2School provides an opportunity for schools to engage with their student's parents by communicating the general announcements or information specific to the grades or under any categories. Talk2School will provide an invocation name for each school and a customized template for them as well.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
